title: 40 minutes daily
info:
40 minutes for 1 day to  The price is 15 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send 40 to activate and d40 to 555 to deactivate

title: 150 minutes per day
info:
150 minutes to Roshan for 1 day at the price of 35 Afghanis. 
For active  Press the green button to activate and press the red button to deactivate. 
Send 35 to activate and send d35 to 555 to deactivate
